Posts.Content: pebbles wrote: A friend of mine has just been diagnosed with Stage 1 IDC, her 2+++, I was dx in 7/05 and had lumpectomy with chemo rads and herceptin. Someone on this site had given out a website were you could get free hats while going through chemo, it was very valuable to me. I was wondering if anyone had the site or knew where I can direct her to obtaining hats, etc. Thanks so much pebbles Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Newbie pebbles conniehar
